name: Mixed Bundle OMBRE Peruvian Body Wave (3 bundles)
description: Our bundles pkg is one of the most popular choices today. You can achieve your maximum length with the natural layer effect and save $$$. Mixed bundles pkg include 3 different lengths. You can also put together your own bundles pkg by purchasing 3 separate bundles and save $$$. Great deals are always available.

name: Malaysian Natural Wave  Mixed Bundles Deals (3 bundles)
description:
Malaysian Natural Wave hair has silky smooth waves. All hair strands is hand-picked, so it has no lice and no chemical process, having the natural state. This style of hair is "kinda straight" with some wave pattern to it. The cuticles are in one direction allowing hair to retain nice body, perfect luster and can be easily altered to be worn curly or straight and will return to its natural curls. No matting, no shedding. From production to packaging, each process has strict control. Customers can wash it and style it over and over!

Grade AAAA+ 100% Virgin human hair without any chemical process

Soft, no tangle and no shedding

Weight About 3.5- 4 Oz per bundle (about 100 grams)

Hair Life 6 months  to 1 year (Depending on care and use)

NOTICE:The price in our site is for three bundle not all the bundles in the picture.

For length between 12" and 16", 2 to 3 bundles are needed for a complete sew-in.
For length between 18" and 24", 3 to 4 bundles are needed for a complete sew-in.
For length 26" and above, a minimum of 4 bundles is required for a complete sew-in.

* Hair color is dependent on donor

name: Brazilian Body Wave  Mixed Bundles Deals (3 bundles)
description:
Brazilian Body Wave is 100% Virgin Brazilian hair. Weft is soft and beautiful with a natural wave texture. The hair cuticles are unidirectional (in one direction). This hair will always revert back to the original wavy state, even after months of use. Please notice, our Brazilian Body Wave hair wefts are measured when straight not in wavy state. So if you want a long hair look, just order longer lengths to create your ideal hairstyle.

Grade AAAAA 100% Virgin Brazilian Hair 

No tangle and No shedding

*The price listed is for three bundles not all the bundles in the picture*

Weight is about 3.5 to 4 Oz per bundle (about 100 grams) 

Hair life is 6 months to 1 year (Depending on care and use

For lengths between 12" and 16", 2 to 3 bundles are needed for a complete sew-in
For length between 18" and 24", 3 to 4 bundles are needed for a complete sew-in
For length 26" and above, a minimum of 4 bundles are required for a complete sew-in.

* Hair color depends on donor and normally varies from 1B-2B, or dark brown.

name: Malaysian Straight
description:
*All hair can be ordered in different texture upon request i.e contact us tab*

Malaysian hair is thicker than Indian and Brazilian hair. Malaysian hair does not carry shine like the Indian virgin hairs, but it does have more body than the Indian and Brazilian hairs. It has a soft and smooth texture, it waves slightly when wet. It naturally has a lot of body and blends well with African American hair types. All wave patterns can be worn straight, but curls back to its original state when wet. Each selections cuticle is intact and you will notice each selection of virgin hair has a natural taper at the ends.
•100% Virgin Malaysian Remy human hair
•Can be colored, cut, flat ironed and curled.
•Last from 6 months to a 1 year depending on care.
•No shedding or matting
•No synthetic mix
•1 bundle 3.5oz to 3.7oz ( about 100 grams)
•12” to 16” needs 2 bundles for a full sew in. 18” to 30” needs 3 to 4 bundles for a full sew in.
•Hair colors are dependent on donors and only come dark brown to light brown.

name: Peruvian Straight Hair
description:
Our 100% Virgin Peruvian Hair is collected from a single donor and has not been chemically processed. It's is a little coarser and thicker in texture than Indian or Brazilian hair. Meanwhile, Peruvian hair is soft & silky with a sleek smooth texture. It looks gorgeous straightened, curled or in its natural state. With 4A grade quality, this Peruvian hair is single drawn with very strong wefts, no shedding and it's tangle free giving you long lasting hair you can use for many years with good care. Our Peruvian hair had assured by many international quality certification authority (vca ect). Our professional team provides customers with absolutely 100% satisfaction about safety, quality and comfortable use.
*Price shown is for one bundle only, not for all bundles in the picture.*

Grade AAAA+ 100% Virgin hair without any chemical process

Soft, no tangle and no shedding

WeightAbout 4 Oz per bundle (about 100 grams)

Hair Life 6 to 1 year (Depending on care and use)
* Hair color is dependant on donor

name: Peruvian Body Wave
description:
All hair can be ordered in different texture upon request i.e contact us tab*

Peruvian hair is fairly new to the market. It is very exotic and blends well with natural or relaxed hair textures. Peruvian hair is very soft, lustrous, and carries lots of volume. All wave patterns can be worn straight, yet they will curl back to its original state when wet. Each bundles cuticle is intact. You will notice each bundle of virgin hair has a natural taper at the ends.

•100% Virgin Peruvian Remy human hair

•Can be dyed, cut, permed, and/or flat ironed and curled.

•Last from 6 months to a 1 year depending on care.

•No shedding or matting

•1 bundle 3.5oz to 3.7oz ( about 100 grams)

•12” to 16” needs 2 bundles for a full sew in. 18” to 30” needs 3 to 4 bundles for a full sew in.

Notice: Prices on our site are not for all hair in the picture. Prices are per bundle.

•Hair colors are dependent on donors and only come dark brown to light brown.

name: Straight Hair Lace Closure 4×4 Middle Part
description:
*All hair can be ordered in different texture upon request i.e contact us tab*

Our closures are great for clients who are looking for a seamless, natural looking finish to their installation. Our Closures are made with 100% virgin hair on a 3x5 Swiss lace. For an additional fee, you can customize your closure to look more natural. Closures offer versatile parting to create the effect of a natural hairline. Clients can part closures in the middle or on the side. With a closure you are able to protect your hair from heat damage while having countless styling options is heaven on earth. Our Closures require little or no maintenance. Most importantly Blending! Lace Closures blend in seamless. The scalp color and density looks very natural. 

Custom closures are made to fit your needs from scalp color, bleached knots to density.  A great closure can change your life and open you up to countless styling options. Blending your leave out with your install is the most important step in achieving natural looking gorgeous hair.

name: NEW!!! Lace Free Part Front Virgin Remi Wigs
description:
*All hair can be ordered in different texture upon request i.e contact us tab*

Hair texture: deep wave, water wave, deep curl, jerry curl, tight wave, natural straight, kinky straight, kinky curl, yaki, yaki straight etc.
Hair Lengths:16"-32"
Hair color: single color, mixed color, highlight color, streaks color, two-tone color etc.
Hair density:150%-180%

Brazilian hair is one of the most popular types of hair extensions on the market today. It naturally has a lot of body and blends well with African American hair types. Hair can be flat ironed straight, yet they will curl back to its original state when wet. You will notice each of our Virgin Hair Full Lace Wigs has a natural taper at the ends.

•100% Virgin Brazilian, Indian, Peruvian, Malaysian Remy human hair
•Can be colored, cut, flat ironed and curled.
•Last from 6 months to a 1 year depending on care.
•No shedding or matting
•No synthetic mix
•Hair colors are dependent on donors and only comes dark brown to light brown.
